name: RARE MAUVE G0 SWIFT CHEAP
bio: *waves*! My name's RARE MAUVE G0 SWIFT CHEAP. I once peed on Confucius's cat. They had it coming. I once dreamed of being a Private Dancer . Now I can be found volunteering at the local kitten rescue shelter all day. Our friendship will be brilliant, preposterous, and full of cereal.
